core.name: core
core.description: Collection of essential SolidJs Composition Utilities

rxjs.name: rxjs
rxjs.description: Enables RxJS reactive functions in Vue

electron.name: electron
electron.description: Electron renderer process modules for VueUse
electron.author: Archer Gu<https://github.com/ArcherGu>

functions.name: accessorDebounced
functions.description: debounce execution of a Accessor value

functions.name: accessorDefault
functions.description: apply default value to a Accessor

functions.name: accessorThrottled
functions.description: throttle changing of a Accessor value

functions.name: createProjection
functions.description: reactive numeric projection from one domain to another

functions.name: createSharedComposable
functions.description: make a composable function usable with multiple SolidJS component instances

functions.name: createUnAccessorFn
functions.description: make a plain function accepting Accessor and raw values as arguments

functions.name: isDefined
functions.description: non-nullish checking type guard for Ref

functions.name: makeDestructurable
functions.description: make isomorphic destructurable for object and array at the same time

functions.name: onClickOutside
functions.description: listen for clicks outside of an element

functions.name: onKeyStroke
functions.description: listen for keyboard key being stroked

functions.name: onLongPress
functions.description: listen for a long press on an element

functions.name: onStartTyping
functions.description: fires when users start typing on non-editable elements

functions.name: pickMutable
functions.description: reactively pick fields from a reactive object

functions.name: reactify
functions.description: converts plain functions into reactive functions

functions.name: signalAutoReset
functions.description: a ref which will be reset to the default value after some time

functions.name: syncSignals
functions.description: keep target signal(s) in sync with a source signal

functions.name: toObserver
functions.description: sugar function to convert a `Accessor` into an RxJS [Observer](https://rxjs.dev/guide/observer)

functions.name: useAsyncQueue
functions.description: executes each asynchronous task sequentially and passes the current task result to the next task

functions.name: useAverage
functions.description: get the average of an array reactively

functions.name: useClamp
functions.description: reactively clamp a value between two other values

functions.name: useColorMode
functions.description: reactive color mode (dark / light / customs) with auto data persistence

functions.name: useConfirmDialog
functions.description: creates event hooks to support modals and confirmation dialog chains

functions.name: useCycleList
functions.description: cycle through a list of items

functions.name: useDark
functions.description: reactive dark mode with auto data persistence

functions.name: useDateFormat
functions.description: get the formatted date according to the string of tokens passed in

functions.name: useDropZone
functions.description: create an zone where files can be dropped

functions.name: useElementSize
functions.description: reactive size of an HTML element

functions.name: useElementVisibility
functions.description: tracks the visibility of an element within the viewport

functions.name: useEventSource
functions.description: an [EventSource](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/EventSource) or [Server-Sent-Events](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Server-sent_events) instance opens a persistent connection to an HTTP server

functions.name: useFetch
functions.description: reactive [Fetch API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API) provides the ability to abort requests

functions.name: useFileSystemAccess
functions.description: create and read and write local files with [FileSystemAccessAPI](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/File_System_Access_API)

functions.name: useFocus
functions.description: reactive utility to track or set the focus state of a DOM element

functions.name: useFocusWithin
functions.description: reactive utility to track if an element or one of its decendants has focus

functions.name: useFuse
functions.description: easily implement fuzzy search using a composable with [Fuse.js](https://github.com/krisk/fuse)

functions.name: useHistoryTravel
functions.description: track the change history of a `Signal` or `Accessor`

functions.name: useIdle
functions.description: tracks whether the user is being inactive

functions.name: useImage
functions.description: reactive load an image in the browser

functions.name: useIntersectionObserver
functions.description: detects that a target element's visibility

functions.name: useInterval
functions.description: reactive counter increases on every interval

functions.name: useIpcRenderer
functions.description: provides [ipcRenderer](https://www.electronjs.org/docs/api/ipc-renderer) and all of its APIs

functions.name: useIpcRendererOn
functions.description: use [ipcRenderer.on](https://www.electronjs.org/docs/api/ipc-renderer#ipcrendereronchannel-listener) with ease and [ipcRenderer.removeListener](https://www.electronjs.org/docs/api/ipc-renderer#ipcrendererremovelistenerchannel-listener) automatically on unmounted

functions.name: useLastChanged
functions.description: records the timestamp of the last change

functions.name: useManualHistoryTravel
functions.description: manually track the change history of a `Signal` or `Accessor` when the using calls `commit()`

functions.name: useMediaControls
functions.description: reactive media controls for both `audio` and `video` elements

functions.name: useMemoize
functions.description: cache results of functions depending on arguments and keep it reactive

functions.name: useMouseInElement
functions.description: reactive mouse position related to an element

functions.name: useMutationObserver
functions.description: watch for changes being made to the DOM tree

functions.name: usePageLeave
functions.description: reactive state to show whether the mouse leaves the page

functions.name: usePrecision
functions.description: reactively set the precision of a number

functions.name: useProjection
functions.description: reactive numeric projection from one domain to another

functions.name: useResizeObserver
functions.description: reports changes to the dimensions of an Element's content or the border-box

functions.name: useStepper
functions.description: provides helpers for building a multi-step wizard interface

functions.name: useStorageAsync
functions.description: reactive Storage in with async support

functions.name: useSubject
functions.description: bind an RxJS [`Subject`](https://rxjs.dev/guide/subject) to a `ref` and propagate value changes both ways

functions.name: useSubscription
functions.description: use an RxJS [`Subscription`](https://rxjs.dev/guide/subscription) without worrying about unsubscribing from it or creating memory leaks

functions.name: useSum
functions.description: get the sum of an array reactively

functions.name: useTextareaAutoSize
functions.description: automatically update the height of a textarea depending on the content

functions.name: useTextSelection
functions.description: reactively track user text selection based on [`Window.getSelection`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/getSelection)

functions.name: useTimeout
functions.description: update value after a given time with controls

functions.name: useToggle
functions.description: a boolean switcher with utility functions

functions.name: useToNumber
functions.description: reactively convert a string ref to number

functions.name: useToString
functions.description: reactively convert a Accessor to string

functions.name: useWebWorkerFn
functions.description: run expensive functions without blocking the UI

functions.name: useWindowFocus
functions.description: reactively track window focus with `window.onfocus` and `window.onblur` events

functions.name: watch
functions.description: shorthand for `createEffect(on()))` and return stop handler

functions.name: watchArray
functions.description: watch for an array with additions and removals

functions.name: watchAtMost
functions.description: `watch` with the number of times triggered

functions.name: watchTriggerable
functions.description: watch that can be triggered manually

functions.name: whenever
functions.description: shorthand for watching value to be truthy
